title: Analysis | Part 1 - Chapter VIII: Little Women by Louisa May Alcott
description:
NOTICE: An interruption occurred so this video was not complete. This is part 1 of this chapter. See here for part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6OI3o3u0KMg

Discussing the meaning of chapter VIII of Little Women by Louisa May Alcott. What does chapter VIII of Little Women convey and what does it mean? This is an analysis and study of Little Women.  

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
